title: Releasing HypriotOS 1.10.0: Docker 18.06.3 CE from Raspberry Pi Zero to 3 B+
description:
We’re proud to announce our 1.10.0 release of HypriotOS - the fastest way to get Docker up and running on any Raspberry Pi.

Features of HypriotOS

Latest Docker Engine 18.06.3-ce
You can use the latest features of the freshly-baked Docker Engine 18.06.3-ce that is still warm. It includes the Swarm Mode, which allows high availability of services in a multi-node cluster within just a few simple commands. This version contains a fix for the CVE-2019-5736 in runC.

Up to date with Raspbian Lite
You can run HypriotOS with an up-to-date OS and Linux kernel which is in sync with the current Raspbia
